required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study Comparing Paclitaxel Plus Carboplatin Versus Anthracyclines Followed by Docetaxel as Adjuvant Chemotherapy for Triple Negative Breast Cancer (PATTERN)
clinical_study.official_title: Study Comparing Paclitaxel Plus Carboplatin Versus Anthracyclines Followed by Docetaxel as Adjuvant Chemotherapy for Triple Negative Breast Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective, multisite, randomized, open-lable Phase III clinical trial (PATTERN study) comparing Paclitaxel Plus Carboplatin versus Anthracyclines followed by docetaxel as adjuvant chemotherapy for triple negative breast cancer

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Arm 1：6 cycles of PC (Paclitaxel 80 mg/m2 ivgtt d1,8,15+ Carboplatin Auc = 2 ivgtt d1,8,15, 28 days per cycle). Arm 2：3 cycles of FEC (epirubicin100 mg/m2 ivgtt d1+Cyclophosphamide 500 mg/m2 iv d1+ 5-fluorouracil 500 mg/m2 iv d1, 21 days per cycle) followed by 3 cycles of Docetaxel (Docetaxel 100mg/m2, ivgtt d1, 21 days per cycle)

arm_group.description: 6 cycles of PC (Paclitaxel 80 mg/m2 ivgtt d1,8,15+ Carboplatin Auc = 2 ivgtt d1,8,15, 28 days per cycle).

arm_group.arm_group_label: 3 cycles of FEC followed by 3 cycles of Docetaxel
arm_group.description: 3 cycles of FEC (epirubicin100 mg/m2 ivgtt d1+Cyclophosphamide 500 mg/m2 iv d1+ 5-fluorouracil 500 mg/m2 iv d1, 21 days per cycle) followed by 3 cycles of Docetaxel (Docetaxel 100mg/m2, ivgtt d1, 21 days per cycle)
